intro: Spatalanthus, commonly known as the sacred lotus of the Andes, is a genus of flowering plants native to South America. Spatalanthus species are often found in cloud forests and are valued for their ornamental beauty. Their unique morphology and ecological significance make them an important subject in botanical studies.
